name: Barker & Christol
description:
It’s hard to categorize Barker & Christol. While we produce a seemingly infinite number of deliverables, we’re not just full-service. We’re not just advertising, nor public relations, nor digital and social. We do that. But instead, we are are problem solvers, marketing counselors, and experts in the execution of integrated strategic marketing.
We understand that the brand is more than a logo. It's the emotional response to the mention of your name or the recognition of your logo. We don't offer a package. Your business is unique and we adapt our product to address your needs. We include nearly every asset in our quiver of tools, from traditional television, print, and radio, to digital tactics like social advertising, OTT, and emerging tactics, too. The most powerful strategy is always the blending of multiple tactics into a seamless and interwoven marketing strategy.
